title: Sunway Sustainability Week
description:
# Sunway Sustainability Week

**Join us in shaping a greener future!**

## Daily Themes

### Monday: Climate Action Day
* Panel discussion with environmental experts
* Documentary screening: "Our Planet"
* Tree planting ceremony

### Tuesday: Waste Reduction Day
* Zero-waste workshop
* Recycling competition
* Sustainable products fair

### Wednesday: Clean Energy Day
* Renewable energy demonstrations
* Solar-powered gadget showcase
* Energy conservation talk

### Thursday: Sustainable Food Day
* Plant-based cooking demonstration
* Urban farming workshop
* Food waste management seminar

### Friday: Green Innovation Day
* Student sustainability projects exhibition
* Green tech startup presentations
* Sustainability hackathon kickoff

---

**All activities are FREE!** Registration required for workshops due to limited capacity.

*"The greatest threat to our planet is the belief that someone else will save it." - Robert Swan*
